trans-unit.source: Represents the metrics used to lay out a character in a device font.
trans-unit.target: 表示用于进行布局设备字体中的字符的度量值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics> object is constructed using the default metric values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics>对象使用默认指标值构造。</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref> class by specifying the metrics as a string.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref>通过字符串形式指定度量值的类。

trans-unit.source: The `metrics` parameter is a comma-delimited string that specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics> properties in the following order: - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.Baseline%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A> The first two properties, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, are required.
trans-unit.target: `metrics`参数是一个以逗号分隔的字符串，指定<xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics>属性按以下顺序:- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.Baseline%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A>-<xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A>的前两个属性，<xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>，所需。</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.Baseline%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics>

trans-unit.source: However, the other five properties are optional, and will default to zero if not specified.
trans-unit.target: 但是，其他五个属性是可选的并将默认为零如果未指定。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify the string value of "0.75,0.75,,0.1" for the `metrics` parameter, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> properties are set—the unspecified properties are set to zero.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果指定"0.75,0.75,,0.1"的字符串值`metrics`参数， <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>设置属性-未指定的属性设置为零。</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: A comma-delimited <xref:System.String> value that represents the metrics for the character.
trans-unit.target: 以逗号分隔<xref:System.String>值，该值表示的字符的度量值。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the baseline value for the character.
trans-unit.target: 获取字符的基线值。

trans-unit.source: The return value represents the vertical offset from the bottom of the black box to the baseline.
trans-unit.target: 返回值与基线底部的黑色框表示的垂直偏移量。

trans-unit.source: A positive value indicates the baseline is above the bottom of the black box, while a negative value indicates the baseline is below the bottom of the black box.
trans-unit.target: 正值指示基线高于底部的黑色方框中，值为负，则表示基线低于黑色框的底部。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double> representing the baseline.
trans-unit.target: 类型的值<xref:System.Double>表示基线。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the black box for the character.
trans-unit.target: 获取字符黑色框的高度。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double> representing the black box height.
trans-unit.target: 类型的值<xref:System.Double>表示黑色方框高度。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the width of the black box for the character.
trans-unit.target: 获取字符黑色框的宽度。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double> representing the black box width.
trans-unit.target: 类型的值<xref:System.Double>表示的黑色框宽度。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the recommended white space below the black box.
trans-unit.target: 获取建议的黑色框下面的空白。

trans-unit.source: A negative value indicates an overhang.
trans-unit.target: 负值表示延伸量。

trans-unit.source: The vertical advance for the character is the sum of the property values <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, and BottomSideBearing.
trans-unit.target: 字符的垂直提升是属性值的总和<xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>，和 BottomSideBearing。</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A>

trans-unit.source: The vertical advance cannot be less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 垂直的提升不能小于零。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: 类型<xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>的值

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref> object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref>对象是否等于当前<xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics> objects are equal if the following properties are equal: <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A>
trans-unit.target: 两个<xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics>对象是否相等的以下属性是否相等︰ <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A><xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A><xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A><xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A><xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A><xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref> object to compare to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"> </xref>要比较的当前对象<xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the objects are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果对象相等，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a hash code from the metric values of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 创建的度量值的哈希代码<xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: 类型<xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32>的值

trans-unit.source: Gets the recommended white space to the left of the black box.
trans-unit.target: 获取建议的空白区域，黑色方框左侧。

trans-unit.source: A negative value indicates an overhang.
trans-unit.target: 负值表示延伸量。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal advance for the character is the sum of the property values LeftSideBearing, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 水平提升为字符是 LeftSideBearing 的属性值的总和<xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The horizontal advance cannot be less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 水平的提升不能小于零。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: 类型<xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>的值

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a comma-delimited string representing metric values.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置表示指标值的以逗号分隔字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> value is a comma-delimited string that specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics> properties in the following order: - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.Baseline%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A> The first two properties, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, are required.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>值是一个以逗号分隔的字符串，指定<xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics>属性按以下顺序:- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.Baseline%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A>-<xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A>的前两个属性，<xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>，所需。</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.Baseline%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: However, the other five properties are optional, and will default to zero if not specified.
trans-unit.target: 但是，其他五个属性是可选的并将默认为零如果未指定。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify the string value of "`0.75,0.75,,0.1`" for the `metrics` parameter, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> properties are set—the unspecified properties are set to zero.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你指定的字符串值"`0.75,0.75,,0.1`"为`metrics`参数， <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>设置属性-未指定的属性设置为零。</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 类型<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>的值

trans-unit.source: Gets the recommended white space to the right of the black box.
trans-unit.target: 获取建议的空白区域右侧的黑色框。

trans-unit.source: A negative value indicates an overhang.
trans-unit.target: 负值表示延伸量。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal advance for the character is the sum of the property values <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, and RightSideBearing.
trans-unit.target: 水平提升为字符是属性值的总和<xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>，和 RightSideBearing。</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>

trans-unit.source: The horizontal advance cannot be less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 水平的提升不能小于零。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: 类型<xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>的值

trans-unit.source: Gets the recommended white space above the black box.
trans-unit.target: 获取建议的空白区域，黑色框上方。

trans-unit.source: Recommended white space above the black box.
trans-unit.target: 黑色框上方的建议的空白区域。

trans-unit.source: The vertical advance for the character is the sum of the property values TopSideBearing, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 字符的垂直提升是 TopSideBearing 的属性值的总和<xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: The vertical advance cannot be less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 垂直的提升不能小于零。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: 类型<xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>的值
